title: Thunder: An Elephant's Journey: Spanish Edition
description: A young African pygmy elephant must confront his fears to fulfill a dream and become a legend â€¦.Thunder, a young pygmy forest elephant, sets out on a journey to find his mother after he escapes capture from poachers. With danger at every turn in the central African jungle, he must face his fears to survive. With the help of some unlikely friends: Soma, a cranky rhino; Frederick, a nutty pink flamingo; Penelope, a chatty parrot; three kooky egrets; and Jennetta Blue, a blue butterfly; they help him with his dream to look for her and fulfill his quest to be united with his herd.
author: Erik Daniel Shein
